TopicTitle: I Kerbalized the MOON movie poster. "EVE" Coming soonÃ¢â€žÂ¢

Articles.Content:
Got bored and made a simple thing in photoshop.

May or may not become a cinematic.
Very neat! May I ask where you got the photo of the Kerbal? It's of fairly nice resolution and doesn't have the horrible jaggies that plague most photoshop/manipulation here.

Thanks!

I got the photo of the kerbal from here:

http://kerbaldevteam.tumblr.com/post/30350635455/well-see-you-on-the-dark-side-of-the-mun-neil

The reason it doesn't have any jaggies is because of the magical Refine Edge tool in photoshop. Seriously that thing is a miracle.

Here's the cutout if you want it:

I knew it looked familiar! I find an even more precise method of cutting things out is to get the outline, feather it lightly, and then copy/erase background. So long as you don't feather it too hard, you can retain a nice outline without the blurry outlines. However if it's a dark picture or very contrasting like your original, it's hardly noticeable.
